meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of musicals.
meanings.sent1: She preferred nonmusicals movies over musical ones.
meanings.sent2: The theater only showed nonmusicals plays.
meanings.sent3: His nonmusicals taste in films always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a mix of colorful dresses and nonmusicals outfits.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with posters of classic movies, both musicals and nonmusicals.

meanings.sent1: The theater offered a variety of nonmusicals for the audience to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: She collected DVDs of both musicals and nonmusicals.
meanings.sent3: The box office sold tickets for the latest nonmusicals in town.
meanings.sent4: His favorite genre was nonmusicals, but he occasionally watched musicals for a change.
meanings.sent5: The film festival featured a marathon of nonmusicals from different eras.
